Meet The Principal

Arun Dongare

25 Years of Commercial Real Estate Mastery

With over two decades navigating India's most dynamic commercial property markets, Arun Dongare has built a reputation on one principle: every investor deserves complete transparency and maximum returns.

From Pune's fastest-growing IT corridors to high-yield retail spaces and NRI investment portfolios, Arun leads every deal personally â€” from discovery and due diligence to documentation and tenant acquisition.

The Remote Acquisition Process

1

Consultation Call (Free)

Discuss budget, preferred commercial zones, and investment goals.

2

Virtual Property Shortlisting

Curated list of commercial properties with high-res virtual walkthroughs.

3

Legal Due Diligence

Our legal team verifies all titles, RERA approvals, and lease structures.

4

Agreement & Payment

Secure digital signatures and guided forex routing for NRI investors.

5

Registration & Handover

Power of Attorney registration, tenant acquisition, and property management.
